labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a user, I want to have the possibility to see available tables so I could make a reservation. And as a Customer I should be able to make table reservations so I could visit the Restaurant on a preferred time slots.

labels.value: src.test.resources.features.ui.CustomerBookingPage_feature.As a user, I want to have the possibility to see available tables so I could make a reservation. And as a Customer I should be able to make table reservations so I could visit the Restaurant on a preferred time slots.

name: Preventing overbooking
description:
US_5_View Available Tables for reservation (R08)
  As a user, I want to have the possibility to see available tables so I could make a reservation.
  US_6_Reservation of the table by Customer (R08)
  As a Customer I should be able to make table reservations so I could visit the Restaurant on a preferred time slots.

steps.name: Given user is logged in as customer
And the booking page is loaded
When "41 University Drive", future date, time and "8" are selected
And a slot is selected and confirmed
Then a reservation confirmed message should be displayed
And the same slot should not be available for "41 University Drive" and "8"
